resources.string: Wellcome to the "Cliente @firma Android" 0.1 Beta.\nThis application allows making electronic signatures from compatible service providers Web pages.\nTo use the app, you\'ll need an electronic certificate and its related private key installed on the device. Consult the Android documentation and your service provider\'s documentarion.
Illegal App invocation, please ask your service provider for a Web page upgrade.
Error trying to send back the signature to the Web page.
